pr_title: fix(TUP-29350): fixed the tMap display issues with Big Sur

timeline.message: fix(TUP-29350): fixed the tMap display issues with Big Sur

timeline.bodyText: it's better to set the default alpha to 255 here.
timeline.author: cmeng-talend
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -72,6 +75,13 @@ private ColorInfo(int red, int green, int blue) {
         this.blue = blue;

timeline.bodyText: it's better to add the alpha parameter here, so that we don't need the new method.
timeline.author: cmeng-talend
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,6 +38,16 @@ public static Color getColor(ColorInfo colorInfo) {
         colorsCache.put(colorInfo, color);

replies.bodyText: As discussed, since not sure what's the behavior on Linux platform， in order to not impact the existing invocation, will not modify the existing method and keep this new method.
replies.author: zyuan-talend

timeline.bodyText: seems there is no caller for this method, but it's better to change the return type from RGB to RGBA
timeline.author: cmeng-talend

replies.bodyText: As discussed, since not sure what's the behavior on Linux platform， in order to not impact the existing invocation, will not modify the existing interface
replies.author: zyuan-talend

timeline.message: fix(TUP-29350): fixed the tMap display issues with Big Sur
fix(TUP-29641): fixed tAdvancedFileOutputXML display issues with MacOS BigSur (#5647)
fix(TUP-29774): fixed scroll display issue with many columns.
fix(TUP-29767): fixed Expression Builder can't show value and can't edit
fix(TUP-29766): fixed blank expression issue with Tab key.
